title: Task Creation via Manual Input
description: Verify that users can create new tasks manually through the Todo interface and the tasks are correctly saved, displayed, and contribute to reward calculation.

steps.description: Navigate to the Todo task creation page.
Enter valid task details with varying priority levels.
Submit the new task.
Validate the task is displayed in the task list with accurate priority info.
Verify the reward points pool updates correctly based on task priority.

title: Task Creation via Voice Command Using MCP
description: Verify that the voice-to-quest feature reliably converts spoken input into Todo tasks with accurate extraction of task details, priority, emotional state, and project categorization.

steps.description: Open the voice input interface and speak distinct task commands.
Wait for the MCP server to process and create quests automatically.
Confirm tasks appear in the Todo list with correct text, priority, and categorization (Edison, Receptor, FrogFace, Personal).
Verify the success rate of task extraction is at least 80% with partial or no errors.

title: Task Completion Updates Rewards and Streaks
description: Verify that marking a task completed updates the reward points, streak counters, and RPG experience points in real-time with UI feedback.

steps.description: Complete a task from the Todo list.
Check reward points increase according to task priority and complexity.
Verify streak count increments or resets correctly following task completion.
Ensure life stats and XP are updated visually and numerically.

title: Pomodoro Timer Functionality and Auto Boost Completion
description: Validate that the Pomodoro timer respects custom work and break durations, triggers sound notifications, and after four completed sessions automatically grants a focus boost reward.

steps.description: Configure Pomodoro timer work and break intervals.
Start Pomodoro session and complete four consecutive work sessions with breaks.
Confirm that sound notifications play at start/end of sessions.
Verify that after four sessions a focus boost reward is automatically added.
Ensure session count resets properly after boosting.

title: Boost Management: Creation, Search, Filtering, and Customization
description: Test functionality for adding custom boosts, searching and filtering among the 40+ activity boosts, and validating reward scaling behaves as expected.

steps.description: Create a new custom boost with specified category and reward values.
Search boosts by keyword and filter by category.
Confirm new custom boost appears in search results and filters accurately.
Validate dynamic reward scaling according to user settings and boost parameters.

title: Achievement Unlocking and Level Progression
description: Ensure that users earn achievements correctly when criteria are met, see animated notifications, and that level progression increments with XP gains.

steps.description: Complete tasks and activities required to unlock achievements.
Validate that achievement icons visually highlight with animations.
Check that XP updates push level progress bars forward appropriately.
Confirm rewards associated with achievements are correctly awarded.

title: Life Stats Tracking and Chart.js Visualization
description: Validate that life stats (Energy, Mind, Power, Social, Pro) are tracked accurately based on user activities and displayed with color-coded feedback using Chart.js visualizations.

steps.description: Perform activities and complete tasks affecting life stats.
Check the stats dashboard updates with correct values.
Validate color-coded feedback matches stat levels.
Confirm Chart.js graphs render without errors and reflect current data.

title: Social Sharing Card Generation and Export
description: Verify that users can generate customizable achievement and progress cards in PNG format or clipboard copy with options to hide rewards values for privacy.

steps.description: Open the sharing interface and select achievement or progress card to generate.
Toggle hiding monetary reward sums on the card.
Export the card as PNG and copy the card image to clipboard.
Validate that generated PNG matches selected style and shows/hides reward values as chosen.
Confirm clipboard copy contains correct image data.

title: LocalStorage Persistence with Auto-save and Session Recovery
description: Verify that user data including tasks, stats, XP, and settings persist in localStorage, auto-save is triggered on changes, and data correctly reloads after browser refresh or restart.

steps.description: Create tasks, modify settings, and update stats.
Refresh or close and reopen the browser tab.
Validate that all data restored matches the last saved state.
Confirm no data loss or mismatch on reload.

title: System Reset: Soft and Full Reset with Confirmation
description: Ensure that performing a soft reset retains key user data but clears progress appropriately, while full reset clears all data after user confirms via modal dialogs.

steps.description: Initiate soft reset and confirm via modal.
Verify selective clearing of progress while preserving settings.
Initiate full reset and confirm via modal.
Verify complete clearing of all game data with fresh start state.

title: UI Responsiveness Across Devices
description: Validate the dark-themed RPG UI is fully responsive, accessible, and visually consistent across desktop, tablet, and mobile platforms with Tailwind CSS and animations.

steps.description: Open the application on desktop, tablet, and mobile devices.
Verify layout adapts properly to different screen sizes.
Confirm all interactive elements are accessible and visible.
Check that CSS animations run smoothly without UI glitches.

title: Error Handling for Voice Input and MCP Server Connection Failures
description: Test system behavior and user feedback when voice input fails or MCP server returns errors or is unreachable.

steps.description: Simulate MCP server downtime or network failure.
Attempt to use voice-to-quest input.
Verify that appropriate error messages are displayed to the user.
Check system does not crash and normal task creation remains functional.

title: Reward Scaling and Custom Budget Adjustments
description: Confirm that users can dynamically set budgets, adjust reward values, and observe immediate changes in reward calculations and scaling across tasks and boosts.

steps.description: Open reward settings and set a custom budget.
Adjust individual task or boost reward values.
Validate the reward scaling reflects changes throughout the app in real-time.
Verify no discrepancies between budget cap and displayed rewards.

title: AI Game Master Quest Adaptation and Coaching
description: Verify the AI Game Master generates adaptive quests and personalized coaching messages based on user life stats, progress, and current activities.

steps.description: Complete several varied activities affecting life stats.
Request or wait for daily AI Game Master quest generation and advice.
Validate quests are relevant to the userâ€™s current stat states.
Confirm coaching messages display clear, motivational guidance.
